00006 static char **EagleMemory_Mocks = NULL;
00007 static int EagleMemory_MocksInUse = 0;
00008 static int EagleMemory_MockInvocations = 0;
00009 
00010 void* EagleMemory_Allocate(char *id, size_t size)
00011 {
00012     void *m;
00013     
00014 #ifdef CUNIT
00015     /* if we are unit testing, check for mocking */
00016     int i;
00017     for(i = 0; i < EagleMemory_MocksInUse; ++i) {
00018         if(0 == strcmp(EagleMemory_Mocks[i], id)) {
00019             ++EagleMemory_MockInvocations;
00020             return NULL;
00021         }
00022     }
00023 #endif
00024     
00025     /* try the real allocation */
00026     m = malloc(size);
00027     if(NULL == m) {
00028         return NULL;
00029     }
00030     
00031     /* zero out memory */
00032     memset(m, 0, (unsigned long) size);
00033     return m;
00034 }

00036 void EagleMemory_Free(void *ptr)
00037 {
00038     free(ptr);
00039     ptr = NULL;
00040 }
00041 
00042 void** EagleMemory_MultiAllocate(char *id, size_t size, int quantity)
00043 {
00044     return (void**) EagleMemory_Allocate(id, (size_t) quantity * size);
00045 }
00046 
00047 void EagleMemory_MultiFree(void **ptr, int quantity)
00048 {
00049     int i;
00050     for(i = 0; i < quantity; ++i) {
00051         free(ptr[i]);
00052         ptr[i] = NULL;
00053     }
00054     free(ptr);
00055     ptr = NULL;
00056 }

00058 void EagleMemory_MockInit(void)
00059 {
00060     EagleMemory_MocksInUse = 0;
00061     EagleMemory_MockInvocations = 0;
00062 }
00063 
00064 void EagleMemory_MockFinish(void)
00065 {
00066     EagleMemory_MocksInUse = 0;
00067 }

00069 void EagleMemory_Mock(char *id)
00070 {
00071     if(NULL == EagleMemory_Mocks) {
00072         EagleMemory_Mocks = (char**) calloc((size_t) 32, sizeof(char*));
00073         EagleMemory_MocksInUse = 0;
00074     }
00075     EagleMemory_Mocks[EagleMemory_MocksInUse++] = id;
00076 }

00078 int EagleMemory_GetMockInvocations(void)
00079 {
00080     return EagleMemory_MockInvocations;
